messages.subject: Re: socks
messages.msgSnippet: **I will keep this thread in mind the next time I discover the socks under the couch right AFTER I finished all the laundry.** There s no such thing as
messages.messageBody:
**I will keep this thread in mind the next time I discover the socks under
the couch right AFTER I finished all the laundry.**

There's no such thing as finishing the laundry. :) Somewhere, somebody is
wearing clothes and getting them dirty.

My youngest kids (and last at home) are gone for the summer, my house is very
quiet, and I'm almost missing their dirty laundry. Last week I went and
rounded up all the stray cups and mugs and glasses from the parts of the house that
I don't visit as much when they're not inhabiting them. Patrick's favorite
Pirate mug was sitting by their computer, and I was weirdly glad to have it to
pick up and wash.

I've been putting things on each of their beds that normally I'd be showing
to them or sharing in some way. It's kind of fun arranging and rearranging,
especially picking a spot for the racoon skull! Hah!

Deborah in IL
